unsupportedCdmVersion.title: [בשBrowser update required؟ل]
unsupportedCdmVersion.description: [בשYou are on an old version of your browser and will not be able to play Prime Video content. Please update your browser.؟ل]
unsupportedCdmVersion.descriptionUnbranded: [בשYou are on an old version of your browser and will not be able to play video. Please update your browser.؟ل]
unsupportedCdmVersion.descriptionChrome: [בשA later version of Google Chrome is required for Prime Video.؟ل] [בשTo update, click the Chrome menu (three horizontal stripes) on the browser toolbar, click About Google Chrome, and then click Relaunch.؟ل]
unsupportedCdmVersion.descriptionChromeUnbranded: [בשA later version of Google Chrome is required to play video. To update, click the Chrome menu (three horizontal stripes) on the browser toolbar, click About Google Chrome, and then click Relaunch.؟ل]
unsupportedCdmVersion.descriptionEdgeNext: [בשA later version of Microsoft Edge is required for Prime Video. To update, click the Edge menu (three horizontal dots) on the browser toolbar, click Help and feedback, About Microsoft Edge, and then click Restart.؟ل]
unsupportedCdmVersion.descriptionEdgeNextUnbranded: [בשA later version of Microsoft Edge is required to play video. To update, click the Edge menu (three horizontal dots) on the browser toolbar, click Help and feedback, About Microsoft Edge, and then click Restart.؟ل]
unsupportedCdmVersion.descriptionFirefox: [בשA later version of Mozilla Firefox is required for Prime Video. To update, click the menu button (three horizontal stripes) on the web browser toolbar, click Help, About Firefox, and then click Restart to update Firefox.؟ل]
unsupportedCdmVersion.descriptionFirefoxUnbranded: [בשA later version of Mozilla Firefox is required to play video. To update, click the menu button (three horizontal stripes) on the web browser toolbar, click Help, click About Firefox, and then click Restart to update Firefox.؟ل]
unsupportedCdmVersion.descriptionFirefox64: [בשA later version of Mozilla Firefox is required for Prime Video. To update, click the menu button (three horizontal stripes) on the web browser toolbar, click Help, About Firefox, and then click Restart to update Firefox.؟ل]
unsupportedCdmVersion.descriptionFirefox64Unbranded: [בשA later version of Mozilla Firefox is required to play video. To update, click the menu button (three horizontal stripes) on the web browser toolbar, click Help, click About Firefox, and then click Restart to update Firefox.؟ل]
